transArray.content: The room is relatively small, close to the subway station and the main road. It is noisy at night

Hello dear guest! Thank you for choosing to stay at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel and giving a 5-point review. We attach great importance to your feedback. Due to the renovation time of the hotel, there is indeed a certain gap between the hotel room area and the newly opened store. Although the majong is small, the facilities in the room are The hotel rooms and supporting facilities in the public area can meet your daily living needs. The hotel is located on the West Fourth Ring Road, with very convenient transportation. It is very close to the 301 Hospital, the subway and the bus station, and the hotel provides electronic parking tickets for free parking. The travel route can be diversified according to your travel mode. At the same time, the room is equipped with complete facilities, electric curtains, refrigerated small refrigerator, and the hotel is equipped with double-layer soundproof glass. It is located on the West Fourth Ring Road side. Closing the internal and external windows can reduce external noise. For guests who sleep lightly, the front desk prepares disposable earplugs for your use. If you have any questions during the check-in process, please dial "9" on the room phone to call the front desk. Our friends will definitely handle it for you. You can also provide feedback with good comments or suggestions. We hope that with your support, we will do better. We look forward to your stay again and wish you a happy life! Manager: Zhang Minghui
